Jingyuan (Leo) Chen

Hi! I'm an undergraduate student at UNC-Chapel Hill majoring in Computer Science & Mathematics. In the past, I've been working as a research assistant under the supervision of Professor James Anderson, Professor F. Donelson Smith, and Professor Shahriar Nirjon. My research interests span a wide range of topics in Systems and CPS-IoT, including Real-time Systems, Distributed Systems, Operating Systems, Mobile Systems, etc. I am passionate about bringing the advances in Systems and AI together and building truly robust, efficient and intelligent systems.

Contact me at leocjy105@gmail.com , or My Github! Here is my CV.
